dimensions: Warp x Weft: 54.5 x 55 cm (21 7/16 x 21 5/8 in.)
title: Chintz fragment
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave. Mordants for 2 reds and 2 purples applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied over resist. Yellow applied by brush. (chintz)
description: Alternation of four S-curving vines (two bamboo-like; two seaweed-like). Each vine sends out shoots alternately left and right. Textile would have been used as a dress fabric and was probably inspired by a European woven silk.
name: Chintz fragment
